sentences.sentence: Ah, I see you’ve come to me for help once again... I may have just what you need.
So, you need to speak with Maurice, do you? There’s a way... but you’ll need to approach him carefully.
If you mention the word 'candle,' it might change his attitude. It has a... certain significance to <color=red>him</color>.
I’m not sure what exactly it means to <color=red>him</color>, but I’ve seen it work before when others needed his cooperation.
Don’t ask questions about it, just say the word and wait. He’ll know what you’re referring to.
It might sound strange, but it’s the best I can do to help you get through to <color=red>him</color>.
Good luck. He’s a tough one to crack, but this might be your only chance to get <color=red>him</color> talking.
